original_text:
People will stagger from sea to sea
    and wander from north to east,
searching for the word of the Lord,
    but they will not find it.
korean_text: 사람이 이 바다에서 저 바다까지, 북쪽에서 동쪽까지 비틀거리며 여호와의 말씀을 구하려고 돌아다녀도 얻지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: People will stagger from sea to sea
and wander from north to east,
searching for the word of the Lord,
but they will not find it.
